strength.title: The source of physical prowess. Provides strong Defense in addition to increasing Max Health, Health Regeneration, Max Damage and Min Damage.

bonusList.70: 70pt Max Health +450 | Melee Defense +200 | Ranged Defense +200

dexterity.title: The source of proficiency. Increases quickness and critical attacks in addition to Evasion and Max Damage.

wisdom.title: The source of mental prowess. Increases Max Mana and Mana Regeneration in addition to cooldown abilities and Max Damage.

perception.title: The source of sense-related abilities. Heightens awarness during battle. Increases the accuracy of attacks, CC effects, enhances time boost abilities and Max Damage.
